record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name="devtype" and term="Device type table" and format.name="devtype" and syslanguage="en"
record.recordid: devtype - Device type table - devtype - en
record.file.name: devtype
record.format.name: devtype

brief.brief: Contains one record for each defined type of configuration item.
The devtype table stores system related information about each type of configuration item (CI), for example, what form to use do display the information about this type CI.

Each item in the Configuration Management database has a CI type. When you define a new CI type, Service Manager adds a new record to the devtype table. Each record contains the unique name of the CI and the pointers to other tables.
